classScheduleInformation: Enrollment in this course is restricted to students registered in an approved teacher education program.
courseSectionInformation: 2 to 12 undergraduate hours. 2 to 12 graduate hours. Approved for S/U grading only. Prerequisite: CI 420 or CI 406 as required by the student's curriculum; Satisfactory completion of all requirements of the Council on Teacher Education Undergraduate or Graduate Common Assessment Plan for Initial Certification (http://cote.illinois.edu/).
description: Course in practice teaching to meet licensure requirements for teaching in the elementary school. 2 to 12 undergraduate hours. 2 to 12 graduate hours. Approved for S/U grading only. Prerequisite: CI 420 or CI 406 as required by the student's curriculum; Satisfactory completion of all requirements of the Council on Teacher Education Undergraduate or Graduate Common Assessment Plan for Initial Certification (http://cote.illinois.edu/).
label: Ed Prac in EC & ELED
